participant_2.background:
I lost my job as a nurse after I was diagnosed with cancer.
green is my favorite color.
i m in the military.
I love to take my horse, Beauty, for rides on the weekends.
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.

content.text: Hello there!  I am doing well, thank you for asking! How are you today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! I am a special ed teacher, and I love my job.  What do you do for a living?
I am in the military.  I have been in for 10 years and I love it!  I am looking forward to retiring and moving to the Midwest where Christmas is a big deal.

That sounds like a great job! I have a lot of respect for the military.  I love the holidays, especially Christmas. I grew up in the Midwest and Christmas is a big deal there too.  Do you have any family in the Midwest?
Yes, I have a lot of family in the Midwest.  I am looking forward to spending time with them when I retire.  What are your hobbies?
I read a lot and spend my time on community activities.  What are your hobbies?
I love to take my horse, Beauty, for rides on the weekends.  I also enjoy gardening and spending time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I love to read and I enjoy gardening too.  I have a lot of family and friends that I enjoy spending time with.  I am glad to hear that you are doing well!
Thank you for saying so!  I am glad to hear that you are doing well too!
